reviews.review_msg: She is really helpful and caring, BUT i would say her exams are really TOUGH !! ;(  our class average is like D+, if y'all love grammar structures, u guys can take this course

super sweet instructor, always patient and provide clear explanation
the tests were bit tricky though

Weekly group work for attendance & participation grade. 2 group projects (20% of total grade), and if you get a bad group, you are pretty much doomed. Barely anyone in the class understood anything and class exam average was always around 50-55%. Hard to understand lectures. Textbook (which is written by Eva) was not helpful.

Okay prof with procrastination. Eva usually uploads and updates weekly content later than what was said. Eva will explain anything you asked clearly but she gives harder exams (long sentences) compared to lectures and homework. She is responsible and you can learn a lot from her. Good option overall.
Patient teacher, nice temper makes her lectures more relaxing. The lecture content is not as difficult, would be a great choice if anyone is trying to transfer to university.

if her exams are base on homework and practice, you will be fine. I take the same class with her again this term, the exams are easier than the last term and she gives bonus points to improve your grade. hope she can keep on this. if you want higher participation grade, answer the qs she gives on the class

Eva is such a sweet and caring woman, however, I didn't find her to be a great prof. Her lecture notes were unorganized and hard to follow. Exams were extremely difficult and much harder than any of our practice exams, homework assignments and quizzes. This course was almost entirely exam based as the weekly homework didn't count for marks.

She is super caring of her students. She always tries to make the students happy whether it succeeds or not, still I respect that. She tries her best in delivering the lecture but your self study might matter a lot.

The exams are unfair because Iva makes the homework really easy and then the exam is nothing like the homework. She is not clear and doesn't explain things well. She is nice but she rushes too much. Take this course with ANYONE else. I wish another professor was teaching because I like grammar.
she's a real sweetheart. her exams are hard but she's helpful and accessible. truly an inspiration. I'll definitely take her course again
Exams are hard to get a good mark and you need understand the grammar rule to analyze sentences

"Eva" introduces stuff in lectures that hasn't been covered and says not to worry about it since we haven't learned it yet - then why bother introducing it? She definitely tries to include everything necessary in her lectures but never seems to make it so the exam has a lot of stuff you need to study outside of class

very helpful and friendly to students,nice organized notes,she always try to improve her teaching, study and put your effort on this course , you'll find things in this class become very easy ,and will end up with a good grade. Highly recommended this prof
She is a considerable professor, always answer students' question clearly and patiently.  Her notes is clear and good quality.

She is a good teacher in the sense that she is always constantly caring about the students and how they feel about the class. She wants everyone to pass and therefore she does her best to accommodate for the students. I've never seen a more caring teacher. I recommend her, although her tests are a bit hard.
